paragraphs.name: Biography
paragraphs.text: Tim Krofecheck is a Web Developer with 10+ years professional experience. Currently he lives in Queens, NY and is working for WebMD as Senior Web Developer since May 2015. Technologies Tim has used at WebMD include Node, Grunt, Require, SCSS, HTML5, CSS3 and various JavaScript Frameworks (jQuery and Handlebars). Prior to WebMD, Tim worked at Time Inc as an HTML5 developer utilizing Backbone, Handlebars and Underscore for developing storefronts on the iPad, iPhone and Kindle Fire. Tim has also upheld several development roles at the New York Post (Web Developer for 2 years) and at Acxiom Digital (Content Specialist and Solutions Developer for 5 years). While working full-time, Tim has worked as a Freelancer and Contractor on weekends and weeknights to improve his skillset.

paragraphs.name: Hobbies
paragraphs.text: video games, on/off/off-off broadway musicals, movies, music, books, building computers

paragraphs.name: Interests
paragraphs.text: Sassy & Snowball (my cats), cooking, home improvement

paragraphs.name: Other activity:
paragraphs.text: May 23, 2012 - MongoNYC 2012. 10gen conference to discuss non-relational database MongoDB.
